data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Lalmonirhat.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lalmonirhat, Rangpur, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Lalmonirhat
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,574 believers in the county of Lalmonirhat the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Lalmonirhat, Rangpur, Bangladesh so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Rajbansi (Hindu traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Lalmonirhat, Rangpur, Bangladesh. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Lalmonirhat, Rangpur, Bangladesh to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lalmonirhat, Rangpur, Bangladesh has a population of 1,256,100.

We estimate Lalmonirhat has 1,574 people who might know Jesus, 3,768 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,250,758 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Lalmonirhat to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
